title: Large T206 Lot - All Cards $8, $11, or $15 **FINAL PRICE DROP**
author: marcdelpercio

posts.post_title: Large T206 Lot - All Cards $8, $11, or $15 **FINAL PRICE DROP**
posts.post_content:
Hello. I have the following T206 lot available for sale. As you can see by the scans, these are lower grade cards. Thanks for looking and feel free to send me a PM or e-mail to [url]marcdelpercio2000@yahoo.com[/url] to reserve cards or with any questions. Payment via any method you prefer. Please add $2 for shipping for 1-2 cards. Three or more cards ship for free.

All cards in the first group are $8 each.
All cards in the second group are $11 each.
All cards in the third group are $15 each.
Take the rest of the lot (11 cards) for $100.

CARDS PICTURED (removing **SOLD** cards from the list for easier reading):

First Group - $8 each:

Grimshaw
Kroh
McElveen
McGann
Rudolph


Second Group - $11 each:

Krause
Lennox


Third Group - $15 each:

Barbeau
Blackburne
Charles
Davis (Old Mill) pinhole near bill of cap
E-Mail sent on a fair number of them.  Looking forward to dealing with you again!
Email Sent on Gasper(Sovereign) and Ewing
Bump for a price drop.  Feel free to make an offer on the remaining lot.  Thanks!

Marc, 

I just wanted to say thanks for the super fast 
shipping. I got my cards today.
One last bump for a final price drop to clear out the rest of these.  Thanks for looking.

Hey Marc,

Will take the Magee, Merritt, Rossman, Downey, Barry  plz
